trans-unit.source: The DirectoryControl class specifies extension data for various LDAP operations.
trans-unit.target: DirectoryControl 类指定各种 LDAP 操作的扩展数据。

trans-unit.source: The DirectoryControl constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> class using the specified values for the type, value, criticality, and ServerSide properties.
trans-unit.target: DirectoryControl 构造函数创建的实例<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref>类的类型、 值、 严重程度，和 ServerSide 属性使用指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The control type.
trans-unit.target: 控件类型。

trans-unit.source: The value associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 与控件关联的值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies if the control is critical.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否该控件至关重要。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies if this is a server-side control.
trans-unit.target: 指定这是否为服务器端控件。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> specifies a client-side control.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>指定客户端控件。

trans-unit.source: type parameter is .
trans-unit.target: type参数是 。

trans-unit.source: The GetValue method returns the data associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: GetValue 方法返回与控件关联的数据。

trans-unit.source: The data associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 与控件关联的数据。

trans-unit.source: The IsCritical property specifies whether the control is critical.
trans-unit.target: 关键属性指定控件是否是关键。

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值是`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is critical; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件是关键代码;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The ServerSide property specifies whether this is a server-side control.
trans-unit.target: ServerSide 属性指定它是否为服务器端控件。

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值是`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is a server-side control.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件为服务器端控件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> specifies a client-side control.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>指定客户端控件。

trans-unit.source: The Type property contains the object identifier (OID) of the control.
trans-unit.target: 类型属性包含该控件的对象标识符 (OID)。

trans-unit.source: The OID of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制该 OID。
